remarks: Value of the univariate degree as a supremum.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ deg1val as of 25-Jul-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
deg1leb.d $e |- D = ( deg1 ` R ) $.
deg1leb.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
deg1leb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
deg1leb.y $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
deg1leb.a $e |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) $.
deg1valOLD $p |- ( F e. B -> ( D ` F ) = sup ( ( `' A " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) , RR* , < ) ) $.
